finalReport.userSummary: Your home has a moderately complex roof with approximately 3,150 square feet (31.5 squares) across 10 sections. The predominant pitch is steep (9.7:12), and the roof is in good condition with an estimated 12 years of remaining life. No urgent replacement is needed, but plan for roof replacement in approximately 10-15 years. Estimated replacement cost: $22,350 (±10%).
finalReport.executiveSummary:
EXECUTIVE SUMMARY

Property: 9222 Wheatland Drive, Germantown, TN 38139
Analysis Date: January 12, 2026
Data Sources: Google Solar API (2021 imagery) + AI Agent Analysis

=== ROOF MEASUREMENTS ===
• Total Roof Area: 3,152 sq ft (31.5 roofing squares)
• Ground Footprint: 2,375 sq ft
• Roof Segments: 10 distinct facets
• Predominant Pitch: 9.7:12 (steep)
• Complexity: Moderate (gable with multiple dormers)
• Ridge Length: ~127 ft
• Valley Length: ~45 ft

=== CONDITION ASSESSMENT ===
• Material: Architectural asphalt shingles (dimensional)
• Color: Dark gray/charcoal blend
• Current Condition: Good (7.5/10)
• Estimated Age: 8 years (range: 6-10 years)
• Remaining Life: 12 years (range: 10-15 years)
• Expected Lifespan: 25 years total

=== KEY OBSERVATIONS ===
Positives:
✓ Uniform color across all sections
✓ No visible curling or cupping
✓ Ridge cap intact and well-maintained
✓ Good flashing around penetrations
✓ No moss or algae growth

Minor Concerns:
• Some granule loss on south-facing sections (normal aging)
• Slight color variation on west dormer (possible repair)
• Debris in valleys (cleaning recommended)

=== COST ESTIMATE ===
• Total Replacement Cost: $22,350
• Cost Range: $19,800 - $24,900
• Cost per Square: $710
• Breakdown:
  - Materials: $11,110
  - Labor: $10,395 (includes complexity premium)
  - Other: $1,890 (disposal, permits, warranty)

=== SOLAR POTENTIAL ===
• Max Panel Capacity: 112 panels (44.8 kW system)
• Max Array Area: 2,367 sq ft
• Annual Sunshine Hours: 1,587 hours
• Estimated Annual Production: 71,104 kWh
• Estimated Annual Savings: $8,532
• Installation Cost: $89,600
• Federal Tax Credit: $26,832
• Net Cost: $62,768
• Payback Period: 7.4 years
• 25-Year Savings: $213,300

=== RECOMMENDATIONS ===
1. Valley cleaning within 6 months
2. Annual roof inspections
3. Check attic ventilation
4. Plan for replacement in 10-15 years
5. Get 3-5 contractor quotes when ready
6. Consider solar installation (excellent potential)
7. Schedule on-site inspection for detailed assessment

=== CONFIDENCE & LIMITATIONS ===
Overall Quality Score: 82/100
• Measurements: High confidence (±3-5%)
• Condition: Medium-high confidence
• Cost: Medium-high confidence (±10-15%)

Limitations:
• Imagery from 2021 (3 years old)
• Cannot assess attic ventilation or decking
• Cannot detect small leaks or interior damage
• On-site inspection recommended for final decisions

This analysis provides a reliable preliminary assessment for planning and budgeting purposes.

immediate: No immediate action required - roof is in good condition
